abstract.p: Correction of April 30 article on newly declassified documents on Vietnam War

block.p: The Word for Word column on April 30, about newly declassified documents on the Vietnam War, referred incorrectly to a sequence of events in Henry A. Kissinger's negotiations with North and South Vietnam in 1972. Mr. Kissinger met with President Nguyen Van Thieu of South Vietnam on Oct. 22; it was four days later -- not ahead of the meeting -- that he publicly declared at a news conference in Washington that ''peace is at hand.''

The Word for Word column on April 30, about newly declassified documents on the Vietnam War, referred incorrectly to a sequence of events in Henry A. Kissinger's negotiations with North and South Vietnam in 1972. Mr. Kissinger met with President Nguyen Van Thieu of South Vietnam on Oct. 22; it was four days later -- not ahead of the meeting -- that he publicly declared at a news conference in Washington that ''peace is at hand.''
